pkgmetadata.longdescription: Desparsified Lasso // Calculates the desparsified lasso as originally introduced in van de Geer et al. (2014) doi:10.1214/14-AOS1221, and provides inference suitable for high-dimensional time series, based on the long run covariance estimator in Adamek et al. (2020) arXiv:2007.10952.
